name: Filled With Wonder
description:
Store the coins in your belly and use your newfound weight to get places you couldn't before!

Submission for the Game Makers Toolkit Jam, July 2017

Controls (Gamepad/Keyboard)
A Button/Space - Jump
Hold both triggers in the air/Shift in the air - Slam attack
Bumpers/F - Drop coins when in a coin dish

Game made in Unity
Tools used from the Asset Store:
Shader Forge, Probuilder and Rewired
